Hi Dave,

what exactly did you do to get this original, monotonous "Spiricom
sound"? When I use Audition to mix the 13 tones, I get a sound like in
the attached file "13sine.wav". Did you also use a ring modulator?

Stefan

-- 

> A couple captures from tonights session with the optical based Spiricom.

> One the first one I get a Spirit who always pronounces my last name incorrectly.

> "Murwinski likes the future"

> The second capture is not robotic like the first.
> "Pray at the end of the world"

> Dave
